verses.name: Genesis 27:16
verses.text: And she put the skins of the kids of the goats upon his hands, and upon the smooth of his neck:

verses.name: Genesis 27:17
verses.text: And she gave the savoury meat and the bread, which she had prepared, into the hand of her son Jacob.

verses.name: Genesis 27:18
verses.text: And he came unto his father, and said, My father: and he said, Here am I; who art thou, my son?

verses.name: Genesis 27:19
verses.text: And Jacob said unto his father, I am Esau thy firstborn; I have done according as thou badest me: arise, I pray thee, sit and eat of my venison, that thy soul may bless me.
